entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You talked to the agent in charge and against their better judgement they have you tracking and inventorying cargo all over Tatooine.
entries.journal_entry_description: Brok discovered that both the Alliance and the Empire are extraordinarily interested in a cargo which recently arrived on Tatooine. In fact they have most of their agents scouring the planet for it. You figure this is a good opportunity for you to start getting in good with one side or the other.  The Imperial agent in charge of the search, Commander Barrezz is in Bestine. You can also speak with Captain Carh'la Bastra, the Alliance agent in Anchorhead.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: A Rebel operative is looking for the cargo. Her name is Captain Carh'la Bastra. Rumor has it she is operating out of Anchorhead. You might go to her and aid the rebels in searching for the cargo.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The Imperial agent in charge of locating the cargo is Commander Barrezz. The Commander is located in Bestine. You should locate him and find out if you can be of any assistance.
